location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter no.3333 of 1854 from Henry Anderson, Secretary to the Government of Bombay, to Captain Arnold Kemball, Resident in the Persian Gulf

mods.abstract: The letter is an acknowledgement of receipt of Kemball’s letter (folio 372) relating to the retrieval of ten slaves from Charrack [Bandar-e Chārak] and the collection of a fine from Shaikh Hassan of that place. Anderson writes that the Governor in Council approves of Kemball’s proceedings.
